root.name: Rock Band: Metal Track Pack
root.description: OverviewThe Rock Band Metal Track Pack was announced on August 13, 2009, and released in North America on October 13, 2009. The track pack is available for the Xbox 360, Playstation 3, Wii, and Playstation 2 consoles, with an initial retail price of $29.99.Like previous Rock Band Track Packs, the metal edition is a standalone game whose songs can be imported into Rock Band and Rock Band 2 via an included download code. While most of the pack's songs were already available via the Rock Band music store, six tracks were exclusives not available as DLC for the Rock Band platform. The exclusive tracks will eventually become DLC at a future point after the track pack is released. Setlist The Metal Track Pack contains 20 songs, 6 of which are limited-time exclusive tracks. They include:All That Remains - "Two Weeks"At the Gates - "Blinded By Fear" Black Tide - "Shockwave" *Blue Öyster Cult - "Transmaniacon MC" Bullet For My Valentine - "Waking the Demon" Children of Bodom - "Are You Dead Yet" Evile - "Thrasher" Godsmack - "I Stand Alone" The Haunted - "D.O.A." *Hawkwind - "Master Of The Universe" *I Mother Earth - "Levitate"In This Moment - "Forever" Judas Priest - "Screaming for Vengeance" Lacuna Coil - "Closer" Lamb of God - "Laid to Rest"*Motörhead - "Killed by Death" *Nazareth - "Hair of the Dog" Queens of the Stone Age - "3’s 7’s" *Rage Against The Machine - "Bulls On Parade" Yngwie Malmsteen - "Red Devil"* = limited-time exclusive track
